000000001010_00000_000_00001_0010011//store 2 in register[1]
000000001001_00000_000_00010_0010011//store 9 in register[2]
000000000000_00000_000_00011_0010011//addi x3, x0, 0x0000 setting base address at x3
0000000_00001_00011_010_10000_0100011//sw x1, 0(x3)
0000000_00010_00011_010_10100_0100011//sw x2, 4(x3)
0000000_00001_00011_000_00000_0100011//sb x1, 0(x3)
0000000_00010_00011_000_00100_0100011//sb x2, 4(x3)
0000000_00001_00011_001_01000_0100011//sh x1, 8(x3)
0000000_00010_00011_001_01100_0100011//sh x2, 12(x3)
